sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable no-undef */ /* eslint-disable no-restricted-globals */ import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import LinearProgress from '@material-ui/core/LinearProgress' import { makeStyles, withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import * as S from './styles/HomeStyles' const Home = () => { /* const [heros, setHeros] = useState([]) */ const [heroi, setHeroi] = useState([]) const [id, setId] = useState() const BorderLinearProgress = withStyles((theme) => ({ root: { height: 15, borderRadius: 5, }, colorPrimary: { backgroundColor: 'grey', }, bar: { borderRadius: 5, backgroundColor: 'red', }, }))(LinearProgress); async function fetchData(search) { let response = await axios(`https://www.superheroapi.com/api.php/3992681667526682/search/${search}`) await setHeroi(response.data.results) //await console.log(`Search - ${search} -- Response - ${heroi}`) } const handleHeroi = (e) => { fetchData(e.target.value) } const handleBotao = () => { console.log(heroi) } return( <>

Heros

{heroi ? heroi.map((hero) => <>

  • ID: {hero.id} - Nome: {hero.name}

    • Powerstats

    • Intelligence:
      {hero.powerstats.intelligence}%
    • Strength:
      {hero.powerstats.strength}%
    • Speed:
      {hero.powerstats.speed}%
    • Durability:
      {hero.powerstats.durability}%
    • Combat:
      {hero.powerstats.combat}%

    Appearance

    • Gender = {hero.appearance.gender}
    • Race = {hero.appearance.race}
    • Height = {hero.appearance.height}
    • Weight = {hero.appearance.weight}

    Work

    • Occupation = {hero.work.occupation}
    • Base = {hero.work.base}
) : ''} ) } export default Home
